acc_toggle_no_blendshape: Target SkinnedMeshRenderer does not have any blendshapes.
auto_closet_description:
1: Custom more button icon

2: Custom more button text

3: Custom cloth button icon
auto_closet_menu_description: Target Expression Menu: If empty, then the menu button will be created at avatar's expression menu.
auto_closet_undo_dialog: Do you want to generate closet for this avatar? This action is irresible!!!
avatar_fx_null: Target avatar's FX animator controller does not exist.
avatar_menu_null: Target avatar's Expression Menu does not exist.
avatar_param_null: Target avatar's Expression Parameter does not exist.
avatar_prefab_error: This avatar is in prefab, and ClothUtility is not able to modify if the avatar is prefab.  Please do unpack prefab and try again.
base_layer_mask_issue: Auto closet generator has found out that the FX animator's base layer contains mask. This can possibiy block the hand gesture from working. ClothUtility recommend to remove the mask manually.
beta_release_no_check_msg: This release is beta release. Version check is not available for beta release. Please check in the discord server manually.
blendshape_if: If this cloth is turned on:
cloth_combiner_name_error: Please enter new name for combined cloth.
cloth_combiner_selection_error: Please select more than one cloth.
cloth_count_low: Auto closet is only available for avatars that has more than 1 clothes.
clothutility_corrupt: Seems like ClothUtility is having an issue. Please close ClothUtility and reopen the window.
combined_armature_warning: Selected cloth has multiple armature. This needs to be fixed.
create_from_default: Create cloth object from avatar default
create_from_default_msg: You can use this to create cloth object from avatar's default cloth, thus enabling ClothUtility to take manage of the default cloth. You should have your existing cloth mesh in your scene. Otherwise, the created cloth will not function properly.
create_from_default_name_error: Please enter new name for default cloth.
custom_blendshape_animation: Add custom blendshape animation per cloth
dynamicbone_error: This cloth uses legacy DynamicBone. ClothUtility does not support DynamicBone. Please convert to VRCPhysBone, using SDK built-in conversion function.
excess_string_error_0: The cloth bones contain excess string "
excess_string_error_1: ". This can confuse ClothUtility, thus it's recommended to be removed.
exmenu_full: Warning - Target Expression menu is full. Skipping menu generation...
fix_fx_msg: ClothUtility has found an issue with installed AutoCloset on the target avatar. Do you want to build AutoCloset again?
found_existing_physbone_dialog_0: Additional PhysBone has found on cloth, bone "
import_existing_cloth_msg: You can import your existing cloth you've applied with other method, and convert to ClothUtility compatible cloth object.
import_existing_cloth_name_error: Please enter new name for this cloth.
no_clothes_installed: This avatar does not have any clothes.
not_a_proper_cloth: Selected cloth is not a proper cloth!
not_yet_implemented: Planned to be released... Stay tuned!!!
optimize_cloth_bones_msg: Do you want to optimize this cloth's bones? This task will modify the SkinnedMeshRenderers' bone structures to use avatar's bone instead of cloth bones (except the ones that has VRCPhysBoneCollider, VRCPhysBone, ETC). This can effectively decrease the amount of bones, but possibly break if the cloth is using any Constaints. Do you wish to apply?
prefab_error: This cloth is prefab. ClothUtility is not able to modify if the cloth object is prefab. Please do unpack prefab and try again.
remove_closet_msg: Do you want to remove closet system from your avatar? Generated animator layer, ExParameter, ExMenu buttons are about to be removed from your avatar.
remove_cloth_dialog_0: Are you sure want to remove
remove_cloth_dialog_1: from your avatar? This task will also remove all the installed bones on your avatar's armature. This can effect other combined clothes which uses current cloth.
remove_cloth_without_bone_dialog_0: Are you sure want to remove
remove_cloth_without_bone_dialog_1: from your avatar? This task will NOT remove your cloth bones, thus making sure the other combined cloth is not affected.
remove_combined_cloth_dialog_0: Are you sure want to remove combined cloth
remove_combined_cloth_dialog_1: from your avatar? This task does not remove the cloth bones of the individual clothes. If you wish to also remove the individual cloth's bones, please unpack the cloth first, and then do the removal for each clothes.
rename_armature_error: The Armature root bone should use uppercase A.
require_update_0:
New update has been found.

Current version:
select_load_method_blendshape_msg:
New - from version 2.2
Old - before version 2.2
select_load_method_msg:
New - Uses ScriptableObject (from version 2.1)
Old - Uses C# StreamReader (before version 2.1)
task_fail_msg: Task failed with error. Please check your Unity Editor console, and send the error log to harunadev!
task_success_msg: Task is successfully finished. Please manually check your avatar!
unpack_combined_cloth_dialog: Do you want to unpack this combined clothes?
use_custom_menu_align: Use categories instead of ClothUtility's default
not_a_proper_avatar: The selected avatar is not a proper avatar.
do_not_put_avatar_bone_to_cloth_bone_msg: The bone you're trying to put is originally located inside target avatar's Armature. This is not allowed!
blendshape_autogenerate_warning: Following blendshape animations will be additionally auto generated:
select_load_method_new_msg:
From avatar - Load config from avatar (from version 2.11)
From file - Load config from file (before version 2.11)
missing_script_error: This cloth contains some bones that refers to missing components. This can block avatar from being uploaded on VRChat. This missing component could possibiliy be Dynamic Bone, if you don't have in your project. Please manually check before removing all the missing components.
constraint_empty_error: This cloth contains some bones that has empty but active constraints, and these can create conflicts after applying target cloth.
play_mode_warning: Playmode detected! Please exit playmode to use ClothUtility.
